body: "I wonder if it is true, that there is a link between Styrofoam and cancer.  And if there is, then why we still using it in green land of Guyana?": Guyana-Gyal is beginning to think that "nobody don’t give a damn."

title: Guyana: The Need to Go Green

sentence: "I wonder if it is true, that there is a link between Styrofoam and cancer.
And if there is, then why we still using it in green land of Guyana?": Guyana-Gyal is beginning to think that "nobody don’t give a damn."
